greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows which arises from A195826 in the same way as A175003 arises from A195310. Column k starts at row A000217(k).
comment: The sum of terms of row n is equal to the leftmost term of row n+1. It appears that this sequence is related to the generalized hexagonal numbers (A000217), A195826 and A006950 in the same way as A175003 is related to the generalized pentagonal numbers A001318, A195310 and A000041. It appears that row sums give A006950. See comments in A195825.
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Sep 24 2011
